CanvasRenderingContext2DFillStyle.summary:
The
CanvasRenderingContext2D.fillStyle
property of the Canvas 2D API specifies the
color, gradient, or pattern to use inside shapes. The default style is #000
(black).

blockquote.para: Note: For more examples of fill and stroke styles, see Applying styles and color in the Canvas tutorial.

remarks.para:
-Canvas API

-Values used by this property:-{{cssxref("<color>")}} CSS data type
